paper_abstract: In this correspondence, we give some restrictions on weight enumerators of singly even self-dual [n, n/2, d] codes whose shadows have minimum weight d/2. As a consequence, we determine the weight enumerators for which there is an extremal singly even self-dual [40, 20, 8] code and an optimal singly even self-dual [50, 25, 10] code.
paper_title: Some restrictions on weight enumerators of singly even self-dual codes
